main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Great Barrington, Massachusetts, on November 8, 1960, described as round and glowing.
interesting points: The object was observed by several witnesses,It hovered for about 5 minutes before darting away at high speed,The color of the object changed during the observation,It emitted no sound,The sighting occurred in clear skies with good visibility.
witness description: The witness described the object as round, glowing, and changing colors, and called the police to report the sighting.
